tests.input:
Why are mothers so unfair??
Generally, I can't complain about my mother.
She's the the best anyone could have if it comes to "normal" things.
Plus, she didn't say anything when I quit school.
But now it's different.
Some time ago I told her that I want to become a vegan and she acted as if I had totally lost my mind or something.
We had a argument that took about 3 days, after that I decided to give up and wait to become a vegan when I'll leave the house (in 2011 I think...) but today I found out by accident that my brother has started smoking again and I'm really pissed off right now, not only because I'm against smokers in general but also because my mother thinks these two things can't be compared.
Her strongest point was that I ruin my health by not eating eggs and diary products but when my brother empoisons himself it's something nobody could do anything about.
I keep telling her, that it is just the same thing but she won't believe me.
She is just too stubburn, but so am I...

tests.name: English_Spanish_9
tests.input:
Why do I love my city?
Hi,
My name is Emilio and I'm trying (as many others) to polish my english since it's far from perfect, there's still a lot of words that I don't understand, but this time I want to talk about my city, Tijuana.
I know that most of you may have heard about it, unfortunately the news out there about Tijuana are not the best, it's true that there's violence in here, but it's just like any other major city, we're not excempt (not sure if I'm using this work the right way) from crime, but that doesn't make Tijuana the most dangerous place on earth, as many news reporters have tried to make us believe.
On the other hand, Tijuana is a city of innovation, of art, where many different cultures blend together and form a unique and different culture, rich and diverse.
I love my city and I invite you all to come down here and see for yourselves that you won't get kidnapped, robbed or killed the minute you step in, instead you'll find a very magical city.
tests.output:

It's true that there's violence here, but it's just like any other major city; we're not an exception. However, that doesn't make Tijuana the most dangerous place on earth, as many news reporters have tried to make us believe.
On the other hand, Tijuana is a city of innovation and art, where many different cultures blend together and form a rich, unique, and diverse culture.

Dragonball Chapter 2: Bulma and Son-Goku
After Son-Goku had saved Bulma the trip goes on.
Soon it was dark and Bulma used a hoipoi-capsule with a house in it.
After they slept they stand up in the morning.
Goku get outside to train a little bit.
He grapped outside a big stone and smashed him.
He ran to another stone to grap him but it was a turtle who look like a stone.

She had looked for the ocean but didnt find the ocean.
Goku wanted to bring the turtle to the ocean.
Bulma came with her.
On the trip to the ocean a big monster with a sword in his hands appeared and wanted to eat the turtle but Goku protected the turtle and hit the monster.
Arrived on the ocean the turtle was very happy and thanked to Goku.

tests.output:
Dragon Ball Chapter 2: Bulma and Son-Goku
After Son-Goku saved Bulma, the trip went on.
Soon it got dark and Bulma used a Hoi-Poi capsule with a house in it.
After they slept, they got up in the morning.
Goku went outside to work out a little bit.
He grabbed a big stone and smashed it.
He ran to another stone to grab it but it was a turtle which looked like a stone.
Goku was really surprised and the turtle told him that she was moving forward.
She was looking for the ocean but couldn't find it.
Goku wanted to bring the turtle to the ocean.
Bulma came with them.
On the trip to the ocean, a big monster with a sword in his hand appeared and wanted to eat the turtle, but Goku protected the turtle and hit the monster.
When they arrived at the ocean, the turtle was very happy and thanked Goku.
The turtle wanted Goku to wait on the beach, because she wanted to show her gratitude.
In a short time, the turtle came back with an old man on her shell.
He said "hi" and Bulma asked: Where is that?
tests.llm_output:
Dragonball Chapter 2: Bulma and Son-Goku
After Son-Goku had saved Bulma, the trip continued. Soon it was dark, and Bulma used a hoipoi-capsule with a house in it. After they slept, they woke up in the morning. Goku went outside to train a little bit. He grabbed a big stone and smashed it. He ran to another stone to grab it, but it was a turtle that looked like a stone. Goku was really surprised, and the turtle told him that she had proceeded. She had looked for the ocean but didn't find it. Goku wanted to bring the turtle to the ocean. Bulma came with them. On the trip to the ocean, a big monster with a sword in his hands appeared and wanted to eat the turtle, but Goku protected the turtle and hit the monster. When they arrived at the ocean, the turtle was very happy and thanked Goku. The turtle wanted Goku to wait on the beach because she wanted to show her gratitude. In a short time, the turtle came back with an old man on her shell. He said "hi," and Bulma asked, "Who is that?"

tests.name: English_Other_2
tests.input:
Set foot in Canada
It has been for six years since I had gone abroad in the first time.
Everything looks fresh and excited to me.
When I landed in this uncharted land, my heart was pumping so fast that is about to jump out of my mouth.
We arrived at Brock University at 23:30 by taking the shuttle bus.
The temperature is no longer refresh but a little bit chilling at the mid-night.
At first, I worried my host family should had already gone since it was too late for them; however, when the warm, pale yellow light pierced the silence in the dark, I felt relieved.
I saw my host mom, Rosemary, she wears a blond median-long hair and has a lovely sweet smile.
As she gave me a gracious hug, I just knew that I will fit right in in the next couple weeks.
tests.output:
Set foot in Canada
It has been six years since I went abroad for the first time.
Everything looks fresh and exciting to me.
When I landed in this uncharted land, my heart was pounding so fast that it was about to jump out of my mouth. ^_^
We arrived at Brock University at 23:30 by taking the shuttle bus.
The temperature was no longer refreshing but a little bit chilly at midnight.
At first, I worried my host family would have already left since it was very late for them; however, when the warm, pale yellow light pierced the silence of the dark, I felt relieved.
I saw my host mom, Rosemary, she has blonde medium-long hair and a lovely sweet smile.
As she gave me a gracious hug, I just knew that I would fit in in the next couple of weeks.
tests.llm_output:

I always want to get the score I need!

tests.name: English_Spanish_2
tests.input:
A house full of animals
Ever since I have memory there's been at least one pet in my house.
We had had dogs, cats, ducks, parrots, hens and chickens, hamsters, fish, an iguane, a turtle and a couple of rabbits (who had like 10 rabbits).
My best friend even drew a comic about me and my animals in school: it was very funny.
The pet I remember and love the most is my dog Randy.
He was 2 or 3 years older than me, he was a dog loved by all the family.
He loved going out and spending time in the streets.
When he wanted to go home he used to "knock" the door with his legs, he was a very intelligent dog :)
When Randy died it was sad.
He was 16 or 17 years old, he was already blind and he couldn't listen very well.
My mom took him to the vet and he never returned...
A couple of days later, because of my questions and my sister's she told us what happened.

In Chinese, we use the phrase "小菜一碟."

Cake, 朝飯, and 小菜 are all foods.

Is there a phrase related to food that describes doing things easily?

All of these phrases mean that something is very easy to do.

Whew! I knew it, our teacher really does care about us.
tests.llm_output:
Skipping Class Lesson
Yesterday, after physical tests, my classmates and I were really tired and wanted to go home. Even though we were supposed to go to class for another lesson after the test, we were too tired and didn't care about the next class. We just went home. 
Haha, we got into big trouble. 
I went back home and slept. While sleeping, my teacher called me and asked why my classmates skipped her class. I explained the situation to her. 
My teacher really cares about my classmates and wasn't angry because of it. 
Wow, I didn't know that my teacher really cares about us.

Individual Study

Individual Study

Since my university's reputation is associated with the students' passing rate in the test, all sophomores are usually asked to participate in an individual study schedule made by the university each year.

Our schedule starts next Monday and will continue for five days each week until the exam arrives.
